content: The most dangerous of his attacks are the kicks that spark and send out a line of fire in your direction and when he roars. As soon as he opens his mouth, jump or step back to avoid the immediate area around him, where his roars will hit. Otherwise, this will knock you back and damage you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
The most dangerous of his attacks are the kicks that spark and send out a line of fire in your direction and when he roars. As soon as he opens his mouth, jump or step back to avoid the immediate area around him, where his roars will hit. Otherwise, this will knock you back and damage you.
